definition: A-Mei, aka Gulilai Amit (1972-), aboriginal Taiwanese pop singer
surname Zhang
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
surname Hui
favor/benefit/to bestow/(literary) benevolence/(honorific)
younger sister

sentences.english: My elder sister got the signature of Huimei Zhang yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我姐姐得到了张惠妹的亲笔签名。

sentences.english: Eason Chan and Sherry Chang grabbed the Best Male and Female Artist Awards that night.
sentences.chinese: 陈奕迅和张惠妹当晚分别摘走了最佳男女艺人的奖项。

sentences.english: It's crazy to me to get the signature of A-mei Chang.
sentences.chinese: 得到张惠妹的签名对我来说不可思议。
